title: Forming a Ranked team - The Shia Leboufs
body:
I would like this to be more of a group of people to play with more than anything else, and forming a team seems like a good start.
-should have a form of communication, skype , ts whatever
- Any tier welcome, 
- 15+ age please
- Don't take this too seriously, this is more for fun than anything else.
- Be able to play at least one night a week, can coordinate once we get the numbers but would like to have some kind of schedule just to keep it alive.

So either post here of add me, I don't mind. But let me know your IGN, rank, role and best night/s to play :)
So if you're looking for a team, or just want a group to play with the JUST DO IT!

replies.body:
s5 support and jg mains if ur keen. I play In 2 5s teams that are not active much anymore but we got to gold 4 ign :
 imtheanimal if ur interested
S4, Adc>Supp>Top>Mid>Jg, can play most nights. IGN: Limeman1

g5 Mid main can jungle well too
22 
play most nights
g5, jg>top>adc>mid>support, 16, can play most nights
Jg/top main s4 ign uM Cyfe

Im 14 almost 15 ; - ; ,Bronze 2 can do any role good on weekends add Dragzneel if you want me :D
Ill be on at sunday or tomorrow
